item.title: UCS Manager Security Hardening (or not) in a vBlock
item.description: Another of theÂ outputs of our recent penetration test was an issue with Weak Ciphers in both the IPMI service on C200 Rack servers and B220 M3 blades and the CIMC https server of the C200’s Ok so can we fix it? Well the answer isn’t a black/white yes or no. We are running the above UCS servers in 2 vBlocks. The first is a vBlock 100 the second is a vBlock 300.
